name: Filp & Win
author: Fadlin Co

sections.description:
This Plugin can be Installed only in WordPress.
Your Key will be sent to given email
Can be choose Normal or Playing cards
Design your own cards .
Design cards for special occasions , Mother’s day, Christmas ,Black Friday Etc.
Unlimited cards can be Loaded
Upload website logo on the card

Emojis Contributors

Under this plugin we use 3rd party Emoji extension
– (https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/emojionearea/3.4.1/)
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of this plugin, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add new.

In the search field type Flip & Win and click Install now.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading this plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favorite FTP application or by using the Upload plugin option in the Add plugin section in your WordPress dashboard. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

screenshots.caption: First, you need to download the plugin from the email that you received.
Once you receveid the email and download plugin .ZIP file now Next, you need to go to WordPress admin area and visit Plugins » Add New.
After that, click on the ‘Upload Plugin’ button on top of the page.
This will reveal the plugin upload form. Here you need to click on the ‘Choose File’ button and select the plugin file you downloaded earlier to your computer.

After you have selected the file, you need to click on the ‘Install Now’ button. WordPress will now upload the plugin file from your computer and install it for you. You will see a success message like this after the installation is finished.

Once installed, you need to click on the Activate Plugin link to start using the plugin. After clicking Activate Plugin now you will see the Flip & Win plugin option in your Left side Menu bar and under Installed Plugin Page.
Now the next step is to activate this plugin. This activation very simple step for this you first click on Setting link as mentioned about picture and then click on Activation Tab.

Once activation tab open simply copy your activation key that you received in your email and past in License Key BOX and click on SAVE CHANGES button. Once License Key save now you able to add/Edit and use all feature of this plugin.
